posts.title: Introduction to JSON Server 1
posts.body: JSON Server is a tool that allows you to create a full REST API with zero coding in less than 30 seconds.

posts.title: Understanding REST APIs
posts.body: REST APIs are a set of rules that developers follow when they create their API. REST APIs allow developers to interact with services.

posts.title: How to use JSON Server
posts.body: To use JSON Server, you need to install it via npm and then run it with a JSON file that contains your data.

posts.title: Advanced Features of JSON Server
posts.body: JSON Server allows you to add custom routes, middleware, and even a full-fledged GraphQL API on top of your existing JSON data.

posts.title: Mocking Data for Testing
posts.body: JSON Server is a great tool for mocking data for frontend development and testing purposes.
